oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Steps towards organic public kitchens
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kärkkäinen, Irma
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Food systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Since the year 2002 Step by step towards organic programme has been EkoCentria's main tool for the work in the national sector. The program is mainly intended for counselling the catering sector personnel on self-monitoring, procurement, planning menus and meals as well as on eco marketing.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Kärkkäinen, Irma (2009) Steps towards organic public kitchens. Paper at: 1st Nordic organic conference : towards increased sustainability in the food supply chain, Gothenburg, Sweden, 18-20 May 2009.
